text:
@GOPLeader @realDonaldTrump @HouseGOP @SteveScalise @RepLizCheney @MacTXPress @RodneyDavis THAT'S ODD‼

"America's testing capacity is up. Positive rates are down"

SO COVID-19 IS OVER?? Apparently we are not all in this together!!

updated: June 30, 2020, 14:22 GMT

 UNITED STATES 

CORONAVIRUS CASES:
              2,684,231

DEATHS:
128,857
